name: ChemisORB
description:
Ward off the wisps from your castle by grabbing magic orbs to cast powerful spells. Learn the different combinations of magic to make your way through! Grab your scepter and have some fun!

We recommend "Easy Mode" if you're just casually looking around, you'll be able to play with our spell system freely. 

Tested only on Oculus Quest 2.

More content to come soon, including screenshots and gameplay vid.

UPDATE: PATCH2 (Submitted after deadline)

  • NEW: indicator of orbs that you have charged up
  • Better balance of foe count and foe stats
  • Improved placement of the orb inventory panel

UPDATE: PATCH1 (submitted after the deadline) 

  • fixes a bug that prevented the player from progressing to the next wave.
